channel.title: 2 easy PI questions
channel.description:
hey i am new to Project insanity
so i have 2 questions
from getting a kill u get 4 points how can i change it i searshed a long time like searshing pkpoints , pk points, you got .... pk points , etc... and i searshed for 4 but no succes so plz help with tha
second question how can i get a NPC drop i did delta like for ever so its so diffrend in npcdrop file it just say 158 995 and i know 158 is ghost warrior and 995 is cash but he aint dropping :S
plz help me i will repp++

item.title: 2 easy PI questions
item.dc:creator: @oldschool-scape oldschool-scape
item.description:
@oldschool-scape wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]^ Sort of.

Go to the PlayerAssistant class. (PlayerAssistant.java)

Search for your applyDead() method. ( public void applyDead() { )

Look for; o.pcPoints += 4;

Simply change the 4.

It’s NPCDrops.TSM; and if you are using Marcbob’s MTP v2 source, you will not be able to turn on drops without assistance.[/quote]

aww and so i cant make drop thingy work or someone of u guys could do it?

Read full topic

item.title: 2 easy PI questions
item.dc:creator: @Qbix Qbix
item.description:
@Qbix wrote:

Guessing this is the Pkpoint system your using.

Playerassistant.java

search for public void applyDead() {

Find pkPoints + 4 (or something similar) in that method.

Change 4 to wanted amount awarded.

I use different methods so do what vain said. Hes most likely far more accurate.

Read full topic

item.title: 2 easy PI questions
item.dc:creator: @claunchii claunchii
item.description:
@claunchii wrote:

  1. search through your booleen’s for your pkpoint class
  2. There should be a NPCdrops txt
